p: In January 2018, a 35-year-old homeless female commercial sex worker presented with a 4-day history of pharyngitis, myalgia, cough productive of green sputum, and dyspnoea. She was asthmatic but took no regular medications and denied related hospital admissions. Other medical history included obesity, schizophrenia, personality disorder, depression and self-harm. She was a smoker, did not take alcohol or drugs and had no fixed abode.
